EmailTemplate.description: Use when NCM has a gap in their case note entries.
EmailTemplate.name: Activity Gap
EmailTemplate.subject: Activity Gap - Report #{!Opportunity.Related_Case__c} / {!Opportunity.Employee__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
There is a gap in activity on this report from [date-date].
As a friendly reminder, please remember that in order to provide high quality, proactive case management it is important to make contact with the Employee at least once every two weeks.
Please reach out your supervisor if you would like to discuss further.
Thank you
